name: Heavenly Putt
description:
A game made to experiment with Unity's Friction physics.

Controls

Number Keys 1 & 2 to switch between Plane and Box settings

Up/Down Arrow Keys to change selected stat

Left/Right Arrow Keys to adjust selected stat

A/D to Rotate in Scenario #1 and to move Left & Right in Scenario #3

Hold Space to Charge Slide, Release Space to Start Slide, and Press Space while sliding to Brake in Scenario #2 & 3

Tab to change scenario

R to Restart
